author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
#### PR description:

Development of HLT menus for `CMSSW_12_3_X`.

This is the PR for the `master` branch, which will then be backported to `12_3_X` (which is currently the release used for HLT-menu development for Run 3).

Includes the integration of the following JIRA tickets.

  - [CMSHLT-2298](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2298): [TSG] Update of GPU-related modules in the HLT combined table (use only `EDAlias`es inside `SwitchProducer`s)

This PR also removes the Patatrack customisation functions for HLT from the `master` branch of CMSSW. After the integration of [CMSHLT-2288](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2288), those customisations are not needed anymore (cc: @fwyzard).

#### PR validation:

TSG tests.

#### If this PR is a backport, please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: HLT menu development for `12_3_X` + remove `customizeHLTforPatatrack.py` [`12_4_X`]
